resources.string: This is a game for two players. One of the two players must be host, and the other must then connect to the hosting player, before the game session can start. \n First one of the two players must initiate a game by pressing the button named "Host Game" in the Main Menu. Then the player will be prompted with a screen seen as the one below. The player has now hosted a game, with the given IP-address and is waiting for an opponent.

When the first player has initiated a game and is waiting for an opponent, the other player must press the button name "Join Game" in the Main Menu. The player will then be prompted with with a screen seen as the one below.
